nodes.text: The gwayo bird was a bird native to the homeworld of Sakiyan bounty hunter Djas Puhr. The bird's eggs were considered a delicacy.

In 0 BBY, Han Solo smuggled a gwayo bird egg to Tatooine for Djas Puhr, his acquaintance, flaunting Imperial import-export regulations in the process. He risked strict legal penalty in choosing to not jettison the egg along with the rest of his illicit cargo, a fact that Puhr much appreciated upon receiving the egg.
